sentences.sContent: The Texas show includes an obsidian mask that likely traveled to Khara Khorum all the way from Egypt, Lessem says.
sentences.sContent_eng: The Texas show includes an obsidian mask that likely traveled to Khara Khorum all the way from Egypt, Lessem says.
sentences.sCn: 德克萨斯州展出包括了一个黑曜石面具，可能是从埃及被带到哈喇和林来的，莱塞姆说。

trans.tranOther: a type of rock that looks like black glass
